useCase.name: Take Automatic Exam
useCase.description: User takes an automatic exam online.

preconditions.precondition: The student is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The student completes the exam successfully.

failureEndConditions.condition: The exam is not completed successfully.

useCase.trigger: User selects to take an automatic exam.

mainSequence.step: User selects to take an exam.
User selects an automatic exam to take.
User builds the exam for the selected exam.
User answers questions in the exam.
User validates the answers for the questions.
User receives grades for the exam.
User saves the grade for the exam.
User receives feedback on the exam.
